description:
Lightweight shorts for hitting the trail. From peak bagging to trail running, the Multi Trails shorts are happiest when you’re enjoying the great outdoors. Made using recycled ocean plastics, these shorts are the kind of comfortable you can feel good about.

  • OceanCycle® certified recycled polyester uses prevented ocean plastics from coastal communities at risk of plastic pollution
  • Added spandex for an easy 4-way stretch
  • PFC-free DWR finish helps you shorts shake of light rain and drastically reduces drying times
  • Soft liner promotes airflow and has HeiQ® Pure anti odour finish
  • Elasticised waistband and drawcord help you find your perfect fit
  • Pockets for small necessities
name: Patagonia Multi Trails 8 Inch Shorts - Men's
